name: admin.conversations.getCustomRetention
desc: This API endpoint can be used by any admin to get a conversation's retention policy.

channel_id.desc: The conversation to get the retention policy for.

errors.channel_type_not_supported: Value given for `channel_id` was a #general channel.
errors.could_not_get_retention: The retention policy could not be retrieved.
errors.default_org_wide_channel: The channel given is a default org-wide channel.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.not_an_admin: The token provided is not associated with an org admin.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from modifying the retention policy of this channel.
errors.retention_override_not_allowed: The current org retention policy disallows modifying the retention policy of this channel.
